response.original_title: 心霊vs人間 外伝 後編 心霊現象を追い求める男
response.overview: This is the eighth horror documentary by Yuuen Kanata, psychic idol Ryua, Shizuku Hoshino, ZeNrA, and others who are gaining popularity through Internet video distribution. The four psychic mavericks go on occult expeditions to Shizuoka and Chiba. A terrifying conclusion awaits in their never-ending "solitary hide-and-seek.
response.title: Psychic vs. Human Side Story Part 2: The Man Pursuing Supernatural Phenomena

titles.title: Psychic vs Human Gaiden: Part 2 - Shinrei Genshō o Oimotomeru Otoko
